comment: A bit more of a bite than Nikka Coffey Grain
Ok so I’m new to this and at first I got a green apple and light caramel smell. It reminded me of Jose Cuervo (yes not a good comparison) However, after I tasted it I got a very light buttery taste.
A mellow sweetness and aroma, faint hints of fruit. Finish with a lingering hint of black pepper. Would revisit this occasionally.
